title: I want a 1Gbps broadband connection for my home. How much does it cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: For which ISP you are asking question. For BSNL there is no BSNL plan which offers 1 Gbps

It really depends on the service provider. For example, ACT charges nearly 6000 Rs. So, I would recommend you to get the list of ISP who are available at your location and choose one a/c to your needs.
